channel.title: Trying to set so client/server work
channel.description:
ok well heres the deal
i downloaded a client off of silab and i got testscape for a server. if i run my client in its folder and i run the runserver, i get the ip, then when i put in my IP adress(im not playing worldwide like quite yet, i want to set things up) my client goes towards loading all of testscape stuff...i dont want testscape's crap, i want to use my client information...
another thing ive tried was to put the runserver in to my client folder, but when i do that it get CLASS script errors, about 7 and them and my server wont run.
so in short what can i do to make my client run insted of testscapes own crap (which in alot of way has to much)

item.title: Trying to set so client/server work
item.dc:creator: @Sharpie_Mark Sharpie Mark
item.description:
@Sharpie_Mark wrote:

i said i downloaded a client…its not mine, well i guess since i edited its mine. But thats not the topic point

i said, i downloaded testscape as a server, my client that i edited has a couple of erros, and heres a picture if you want some more help on what im talking about

by the way, im useing that big compile thing thats the perfect compiler will all these commands, now when i press run it comes up with errors and i cant run the client. but when i click the run button, i can run the client untill it askes to log in, then i get an error saying it cant connect…

thats any clearer?

Read full topic
item.source: Trying to set so client/server work

item.description:
@nigelthechamp wrote:

i cant understand one bit of that. are you trying to say you want to run your server off your client like in moparscape? if so… you cant do that.
